labels.label: Monitors the person table for any changes newer than the initial state. Initial state will be set to the most recent record when NiFi is first started

config.comments: Monitors the [Person].last_chg_time column, creating a message for each row that have a last_chg_time greater than the previous value.

processGroups.comments: When first connected to a database, this process group will fetch all person ids in batches.

labels.label: Execute the provided SELECT statement to fetch a batch of Ids

Generates a series of SELECT statements to get batches of person_uid's
Example: SELECT person_parent_uid FROM person WHERE person_parent_uid <= 263758719 AND person_parent_uid >= 9025000 AND person_parent_uid < 9035000
Split the batch of Ids into groups of 50
Pull the Id's into an attribute

processGroups.name: Person Initial Load

entry.value: select count(distinct person_parent_uid) row_count from person WITH(NOLOCK)

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

value.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

labels.label: Remove [ and ] from the list if present
Send a SQL request to fetch all the necessary data to insert into Elasticsearch

The database returns some nested JSON fields and those are interpreted as strings by NiFi. These processors extract the fields into an attribute, remove the existing fields from the flowfile, and then use the ReplaceText to insert the JSON back into the flowfile

entry.value: Failed to insert person record with id: ${_id}

SELECT p.person_uid, p.add_time, p.add_user_id, p.as_of_date_admin, p.as_of_date_ethnicity, p.as_of_date_general, p.as_of_date_morbidity, p.as_of_date_sex, p.birth_time, p.birth_time_calc, p.cd, p.curr_sex_cd, p.deceased_ind_cd, p.electronic_ind, p.ethnic_group_ind, p.last_chg_time, p.last_chg_user_id, p.marital_status_cd, p.record_status_cd, p.record_status_time, p.status_cd, p.status_time, p.local_id, p.version_ctrl_nbr, p.edx_ind, p.dedup_match_ind, p.first_nm, p.middle_nm, p.last_nm, p.person_uid id, nested.address, nested.phone, nested.email, nested.name, nested.race, nested.entity_id,
--documentIds (SELECT STUFF( ( SELECT ','+ cast(documentId as varchar) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT doc.local_id documentId FROM nbs_document doc WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN Participation par WITH (NOLOCK) ON doc.nbs_document_uid = par.act_uid AND par.subject_class_cd = 'PSN' AND par.record_status_cd = 'ACTIVE' AND par.act_class_cd = 'DOC' AND par.type_cd = 'SubjOfDoc' JOIN Person p2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON par.subject_entity_uid=p2.person_uid AND p2.person_parent_uid=p.person_parent_uid AND p2.person_parent_uid in(${person_ids}) JOIN NBS_SRTE..Code_value_general cvg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cvg.code_set_nm = 'PUBLIC_HEALTH_EVENT' AND cvg.code = doc.doc_type_cd ) tmp FOR XML PATH('') ), 1, 1, '')) document_ids,
--morbidityReportIds (SELECT STUFF( ( SELECT ','+ cast(morbidityReportId as varchar) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT obs.local_id morbidityReportId FROM Observation obs WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN Participation par WITH (NOLOCK) ON par.act_uid = obs.observation_uid AND par.subject_class_cd = 'PSN' AND par.record_status_cd = 'ACTIVE' AND par.act_class_cd = 'OBS' AND par.type_cd = 'SubjOfMorbReport' JOIN Person p2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON par.subject_entity_uid=p2.person_uid AND p2.person_parent_uid=p.person_parent_uid AND p2.person_parent_uid in(${person_ids}) ) tmp FOR XML PATH('') ), 1, 1, '')) morbidity_report_ids,
--treatmentIds (SELECT STUFF( ( SELECT ','+ cast(treatmentId as varchar) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT trt.local_id treatmentId FROM Treatment trt with (NOLOCK) JOIN Participation par WITH (NOLOCK) ON par.act_uid = trt.treatment_uid JOIN Person p2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON par.subject_entity_uid=p2.person_uid AND p2.person_parent_uid=p.person_parent_uid AND p2.person_parent_uid in(${person_ids}) AND par.act_class_cd = 'TRMT' AND par.record_status_cd = 'ACTIVE' AND par.subject_class_cd='PSN' AND par.type_cd = 'SubjOfTrmt' ) tmp FOR XML PATH('') ), 1, 1, '')) treatment_ids,
--vaccinationIds (SELECT STUFF( ( SELECT ','+ cast(vaccinationId as varchar) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT inv.local_id vaccinationId FROM Intervention inv WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN Participation par WITH (NOLOCK) ON inv.intervention_uid = par.act_uid AND par.subject_class_cd='PAT' AND par.type_cd = 'SubOfVacc' JOIN Person p2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON par.subject_entity_uid=p2.person_uid AND p2.person_parent_uid=p.person_parent_uid AND p2.person_parent_uid in(${person_ids}) ) tmp FOR XML PATH('') ), 1, 1, '')) vaccination_ids,
--State Case Ids (SELECT STUFF( ( SELECT ','+ cast(stateCaseId as varchar) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ai.root_extension_txt stateCaseId FROM Public_health_case phc WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN Act_id ai WITH (NOLOCK) ON phc.public_health_case_uid = ai.act_uid and ai.type_cd='STATE' and (ai.assigning_authority_cd <> 'ABCS' OR ai.assigning_authority_cd IS NULL) and ai.root_extension_txt is not null and ai.root_extension_txt<>'' JOIN participation par WITH (NOLOCK) ON par.act_uid = phc.public_health_case_uid JOIN Person p2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON par.subject_entity_uid=p2.person_uid AND p2.person_parent_uid=p.person_parent_uid AND p2.person_parent_uid in(${person_ids}) ) tmp FOR XML PATH('') ), 1, 1, '')) state_case_ids,
--ABCS Case IDs (SELECT STUFF( ( SELECT ','+ cast(abcsCaseId as varchar) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ai.root_extension_txt abcsCaseId FROM Public_health_case phc WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN Act_id ai WITH (NOLOCK) ON phc.public_health_case_uid = ai.act_uid and ai.act_id_seq=2 and ai.type_cd='STATE' and ai.assigning_authority_cd='ABCS' and ai.root_extension_txt is not null and ai.root_extension_txt<>'' JOIN participation par WITH (NOLOCK) ON par.act_uid = phc.public_health_case_uid JOIN Person p2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON par.subject_entity_uid=p2.person_uid AND p2.person_parent_uid=p.person_parent_uid AND p2.person_parent_uid in(${person_ids}) ) tmp FOR XML PATH('') ), 1, 1, '')) abcs_case_ids,
--City Case Ids (SELECT STUFF( ( SELECT ','+ cast(cityCaseId as varchar) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ai.root_extension_txt cityCaseId FROM Public_health_case phc WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN Act_id ai WITH (NOLOCK) ON phc.public_health_case_uid = ai.act_uid and ai.type_cd='CITY' and ai.root_extension_txt is not null and ai.root_extension_txt<>'' JOIN participation par WITH (NOLOCK) ON par.act_uid = phc.public_health_case_uid JOIN Person p2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON par.subject_entity_uid=p2.person_uid AND p2.person_parent_uid=p.person_parent_uid AND p2.person_parent_uid in(${person_ids}) ) tmp FOR XML PATH('') ), 1, 1, '')) city_case_ids,
--Notification Ids (SELECT STUFF( ( SELECT ','+ cast(notificationId as varchar) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT noti.local_id notificationId FROM Public_health_case phc WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN Act_relationship ar WITH (NOLOCK) ON ar.target_act_uid=phc.public_health_case_uid AND ar.type_cd='Notification' AND ar.target_class_cd='CASE' AND ar.source_class_cd='NOTF' AND ar.record_status_cd='ACTIVE' JOIN notification noti WITH (NOLOCK) ON noti.notification_uid=ar.source_act_uid JOIN participation par WITH (NOLOCK) ON par.act_uid = phc.public_health_case_uid JOIN Person p2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON par.subject_entity_uid=p2.person_uid AND p2.person_parent_uid=p.person_parent_uid AND p2.person_parent_uid in(${person_ids}) ) tmp FOR XML PATH('') ), 1, 1, '')) notification_ids,
--Investigation Ids (SELECT STUFF( ( SELECT ','+ cast(investigationId as varchar) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT phc.local_id investigationId FROM Public_health_case phc WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN participation par WITH (NOLOCK) ON par.act_uid = phc.public_health_case_uid JOIN Person p2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON par.subject_entity_uid=p2.person_uid AND p2.person_parent_uid=p.person_parent_uid AND p2.person_parent_uid in(${person_ids}) ) tmp FOR XML PATH('') ), 1, 1, '')) investigation_ids,
--Lab Report Ids (SELECT STUFF( ( SELECT ','+ cast(labReportId as varchar) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT obs.local_id labReportId FROM observation obs WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN participation par WITH (NOLOCK) ON par.act_uid = obs.observation_uid JOIN Person p2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON par.subject_entity_uid=p2.person_uid AND p2.person_parent_uid=p.person_parent_uid AND p2.person_parent_uid in(${person_ids}) ) tmp FOR XML PATH('') ), 1, 1, '')) lab_report_ids,
--Accession Ids (SELECT STUFF( ( SELECT ','+ cast(accessionId as varchar) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ai.root_extension_txt accessionId FROM observation obs WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN act_id ai WITH (NOLOCK) ON ai.act_uid = obs.observation_uid AND ai.type_cd='FN' and ai.root_extension_txt is not null and ai.root_extension_txt<>'' JOIN participation par WITH (NOLOCK) ON par.act_uid = obs.observation_uid JOIN Person p2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON par.subject_entity_uid=p2.person_uid AND p2.person_parent_uid=p.person_parent_uid AND p2.person_parent_uid in(${person_ids}) ) tmp FOR XML PATH('') ), 1, 1, '')) accession_ids
FROM person p WITH (NOLOCK) OUTER apply ( SELECT * FROM -- address ( SELECT ( SELECT STRING_ESCAPE(pl.street_addr1, 'json') streetAddr1, STRING_ESCAPE(pl.street_addr2, 'json') streetAddr2, STRING_ESCAPE(pl.city_desc_txt, 'json') city, pl.zip_cd zip, pl.cnty_cd cntyCd, pl.state_cd state, pl.cntry_cd cntryCd, [county].code_desc_txt cntyText, [state].state_nm stateText, [country].code_short_desc_txt cntryText FROM Entity_locator_participation elp WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN Postal_locator pl WITH (NOLOCK) ON elp.locator_uid = pl.postal_locator_uid left join NBS_SRTE..State_county_code_value [county] WITH (NOLOCK) on [county].code = pl.cnty_cd left join NBS_SRTE..State_code [state] WITH (NOLOCK) on [state].state_cd = pl.state_cd left join NBS_SRTE..Country_code [country] WITH (NOLOCK) on [country].code = pl.cntry_cd WHERE elp.entity_uid = p.person_uid AND elp.class_cd = 'PST' AND elp.status_cd = 'A' FOR json path, INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) AS address ) AS address, -- person phone ( SELECT ( SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(tl.phone_nbr_txt,'-',''),' ','') telephoneNbr, tl.extension_txt extensionTxt, elp.cd typeCd, elp.use_cd useCd FROM Entity_locator_participation elp WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN Tele_locator tl WITH (NOLOCK) ON elp.locator_uid = tl.tele_locator_uid WHERE elp.entity_uid = p.person_uid AND elp.class_cd = 'TELE' AND elp.status_cd = 'A' AND tl.phone_nbr_txt IS NOT NULL FOR json path, INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) AS phone ) AS phone, -- person email ( SELECT ( SELECT STRING_ESCAPE(tl.email_address, 'json') emailAddress FROM Entity_locator_participation elp WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN Tele_locator tl WITH (NOLOCK) ON elp.locator_uid = tl.tele_locator_uid WHERE elp.entity_uid = p.person_uid AND elp.class_cd = 'TELE' AND elp.status_cd = 'A' AND tl.email_address IS NOT NULL FOR json path, INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) AS email ) AS email, -- person_names ( SELECT ( SELECT STRING_ESCAPE(REPLACE(pn.last_nm,'-',' '), 'json') lastNm, soundex(pn.last_nm) lastNmSndx, STRING_ESCAPE(pn.middle_nm, 'json') middleNm, STRING_ESCAPE(pn.first_nm, 'json') firstNm, soundex(pn.first_nm) firstNmSndx, pn.nm_use_cd, pn.nm_suffix nmSuffix, pn.nm_degree nmDegree FROM person_name pn WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE person_uid = p.person_uid FOR json path, INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) AS name ) AS name, -- person races ( SELECT ( SELECT pr.race_cd raceCd, pr.race_desc_txt raceDescTxt, pr.race_category_cd raceCategoryCd FROM Person_race pr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE person_uid = p.person_uid FOR json path, INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) AS race ) AS race, -- Entity id ( SELECT ( SELECT ei.type_cd typeCd, ei.record_status_cd recordStatusCd, STRING_ESCAPE(REPLACE(REPLACE(ei.root_extension_txt,'-',''),' ',''), 'json') rootExtensionTxt FROM entity_id ei WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ei.entity_uid = p.person_uid FOR json path, INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) AS entity_id ) AS entity_id ) AS nested WHERE p.person_uid in(${person_ids}) AND p.person_uid = p.person_parent_uid;
Failed to retrieve patient data for ids: ${person_ids}

labels.label: Monitors the person_race table for any changes newer than the initial state. Initial state will be set to the most recent record when NiFi is first started

entry.value: SELECT p.person_parent_uid person_uid, person_race.last_chg_time FROM person_race WITH(NOLOCK) join person p WITH(NOLOCK) ON p.person_uid = person_race.person_uid

labels.label: Monitors the person_name table for any changes newer than the initial state. Initial state will be set to the most recent record when NiFi is first started

entry.value: SELECT p.person_parent_uid person_uid, person_name.last_chg_time FROM person_name WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN person p WITH (NOLOCK) ON person_name.person_uid = p.person_uid

labels.label: Monitors the entity_locator_participation table for any changes newer than the initial state. Initial state will be set to the most recent record when NiFi is first started

entry.value:
SELECT p.person_parent_uid person_uid, elp.last_chg_time
FROM Entity_locator_participation elp WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN person p WITH(NOLOCK) ON p.person_uid = elp.entity_uid

labels.label: Monitors the entity_id table for any changes newer than the initial state. Initial state will be set to the most recent record when NiFi is first started

entry.value: SELECT person_parent_uid person_uid, eid.last_chg_time FROM entity_id eid WITH(NOLOCK) join Person p WITH(NOLOCK) ON p.person_uid = entity_uid
